definition: to thank/to apologize/to wither (of flowers, leaves etc)/to decline
to thank/to apologize/to wither (of flowers, leaves etc)/to decline

sentences.english: MBL's work is truly amazing, thank you for letting me be a part of it.
sentences.chinese: MBL的工作確實是驚人的，謝謝你讓我成爲一部分。

sentences.english: Thank you for taking the time to come over.
sentences.chinese: 謝謝您特地來我們這兒。

sentences.english: OK. Thank you. Where should I buy them?
sentences.chinese: 好的，謝謝你。我在哪裏買藥？

sentences.english: Thanks so much. I owe you one.
sentences.chinese: 真謝謝你，我欠你一份情。

sentences.english: Don't remove to other Forums, Blogs and Baidu. Thanks.
sentences.chinese: 站內公告，請不要轉出雲音，謝謝。

sentences.english: Mr. President, thank you for your gracious introduction.
sentences.chinese: 校長先生，謝謝你的親切介紹。

sentences.english: Thank you for letting us come by.
sentences.chinese: 謝謝你允許我們前來致哀。

sentences.english: Thanks for viewing and the support. Did you mean skiing or Vietnamese pho?
sentences.chinese: 謝謝你的觀看與支持，你是指滑雪還是越南河粉？

sentences.english: The dry river-bed clothes finds no thanks for its past.
sentences.chinese: 枯槁的河牀，並不謝謝它的已往。

sentences.english: C: Yes,thanks.What denomination do you need?
sentences.chinese: 是的，謝謝。你需要什麼面額的？

sentences.english: Hi, thank you for subscribing Greenhill Bookstore e-paper, and we hope all of you enjoy it.
sentences.chinese: 謝謝您訂閱格林希爾電子報，希望您會喜歡。

sentences.english: Thanks again and could you please say thank you to all your workman for me too.
sentences.chinese: 再次感謝並且希望你代我對所有的工作人員說聲謝謝。

sentences.english: Thank you for your giving me this opportunity, and i promise you that i wil not let you down.
sentences.chinese: 謝謝您給我這個機會，保證不會讓您失望的。

sentences.english: Thanks for your wonderful lecture, President Chen.
sentences.chinese: 謝謝陳會長的精彩報告。

definition: to thank/to apologize/to wither (of flowers, leaves etc)/to decline
original poster (in an online forum)/landlord of a building (traditional)
to help/to assist/to support/for sb (i.e. as a help)/hired (as worker)/side (of pail, boat etc)/outer layer/upper (of a shoe)/group/gang/clique/party/secret society
Correct!/Oh, that's right, ... (when one suddenly remembers sth one wanted to mention)/Oh, by the way, ...
only/merely/no more than/but/however/anyway (to get back to a previous topic)/cannot be more (after adjectival)

apex/crown of the head/top/roof/most/to carry on the head/to push to the top/to go against/to replace/to substitute/to be subjected to (an aerial bombing, hailstorm etc)/(slang) to "bump" a forum thread to raise its profile/classifier for headwear, hats, veils etc
It is said that ... (at the start of a narrative)/to discuss/to recount
to help/to lend a hand/to do a favor/to do a good turn
that's right/sure!/rest assured!/that's good/can't go wrong
